traits.title: Dark Vision
traits.description: Accustomed to life underground, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.title: Dwarven Resilience
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage

traits.title: Dwarven Combat Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with the battleaxe, handaxe, throwing hammer, and warhammer.

traits.title: Tool Proficiency
traits.description: You gain proficiency with the artisan’s tools of your choice: smith’s tools, brewer’s supplies, or mason’s tools.

traits.title: Stonecunning
traits.description: Whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to the origin of stonework, you are considered proficient in the History skill and add double your proficiency bonus to the check, instead of your normal proficiency bonus.

traits.title: Dwarven Toughness
traits.description: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

traits.title: Dwarven Toughness
traits.description: You have proficiency with light and medium armor.

traits.title: Darkvision
traits.description: Accustomed to twilit forests and the night sky, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.title: Keen Senses
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

traits.title: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can’t put you to sleep.

traits.title: Trance
traits.description: Elves don’t need to sleep. Instead, they meditate deeply, remaining sem iconscious, for 4 hours a day. (The Common word for such meditation is “trance.”) While meditating, you can dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have becom e reflexive through years of practice. After resting in this way, you gain the sam e benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep.

traits.title: Elf Weapon Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.

traits.title: Cantrip
traits.description: You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

traits.title: Extra Language
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.

traits.title: Elf Weapon Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.

traits.title: Fleet of Foot
traits.description: Your base walking speed increases to 35 feet.

traits.title: Mask of the Wild
traits.description: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

traits.title: Superior Darkvision
traits.description: Your darkvision has a radius of 120 feet.

traits.title: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

traits.title: Drow Magic
traits.description: You know the dancing lights cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the faerie fire spell once per day. When you reach 5th level, you can also cast the darkness spell once per day. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

traits.title: Drow Weapon Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with rapiers, shortswords, and hand crossbows.

traits.title: Lucky
traits.description: When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

traits.title: Brave
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.title: Halfling Nimbleness
traits.description: You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours

traits.title: Naturally Stealthy
traits.description: You can attempt to hide even when you are obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than you.

traits.title: Stout Resilience
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.

races.name: Human
races.abilityScoreIncrease: Your ability scores each increase by 1.

races.name: Dragonborn
races.abilityScoreIncrease: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.

traits.title: Draconic Ancestry
traits.description: You have draconic ancestry. Choose one type of dragon from the Draconic Ancestry table. Your breath weapon and damage resistance are determined by the dragon type, as shown in the table.

traits.title: Breath Weapon
traits.description: You can use your action to exhale destructive energy. Your draconic ancestry determines the size, shape, and damage type of the exhalation.

traits.title: Damage Type
traits.description: Acid

traits.title: Breath Weapon
traits.description: 5 by 30 ft. line (Dex. save)

traits.title: Damage Type
traits.description: Lightning

traits.title: Breath Weapon
traits.description: 5 by 30 ft. line (Dex. save)

traits.title: Damage Type
traits.description: Fire

traits.title: Breath Weapon
traits.description: 5 by 30 ft. line (Dex. save)

traits.title: Damage Type
traits.description: Lightning

traits.title: Breath Weapon
traits.description: 5 by 30 ft. line (Dex. save)

traits.title: Damage Type
traits.description: Acid

traits.title: Breath Weapon
traits.description: 5 by 30 ft. line (Dex. save)

traits.title: Damage Type
traits.description: Fire

traits.title: Breath Weapon
traits.description: 5 by 30 ft. line (Dex. save)

traits.title: Damage Type
traits.description: Poison

traits.title: Breath Weapon
traits.description: 15 ft. cone (Dex. save)

traits.title: Damage Type
traits.description: Fire

traits.title: Breath Weapon
traits.description: 15 ft. cone (Dex. save)

traits.title: Damage Type
traits.description: Cold

traits.title: Breath Weapon
traits.description: 15 ft. cone (Dex. save)

traits.title: Damage Type
traits.description: Cold

traits.title: Breath Weapon
traits.description: 15 ft. cone (Dex. save)

traits.title: Darkvision
traits.description: Accustomed to life underground, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.title: Gnome Cunning
traits.description: You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

traits.title: Natural Illusionist
traits.description: You know the minor illusion cantrip. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

traits.title: Speak with Small Beasts
traits.description: Through sounds and gestures, you can communicate simple ideas with Small or smaller beasts. Forest gnom es love animals and often keep squirrels, badgers, rabbits, moles, woodpeckers, and other creatures as beloved pets.

traits.title: Artificer’s Lore
traits.description: Whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to magic items, alchemical objects, or technological devices, you can add twice your proficiency bonus, instead of any proficiency bonus you normally apply.

traits.title: Tinker
traits.description: You have proficiency with artisan’s tools (tinker’s tools). Using those tools, you can spend 1 hour and 10 gp worth of materials to construct a Tiny clockwork device (AC 5, 1 hp). The device ceases to function after 24 hours (unless you spend 1 hour repairing it to keep the device functioning), or when you use your action to dismantle it; at that time, you can reclaim the materials used to create it. You can have up to three such devices active at a time. (Clockwork Toy, Fire Starter, Music Box)

races.name: Half-Elf
races.abilityScoreIncrease: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and two other ability scores of your choice increase by 1.

traits.title: Darkvision
traits.description: Thanks to your elf blood, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.title: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can’t put you to sleep.

traits.title: Skill Versatility
traits.description: You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice.

races.name: Half-Orc
races.abilityScoreIncrease: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

traits.title: Darkvision
traits.description: Thanks to your orc blood, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray

traits.title: Menacing
traits.description: You gain proficiency in the Intimidation skill.

traits.title: Relentless Endurance
traits.description: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. You can’t use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

traits.title: Savage Attacks
traits.description: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you can roll one of the weapon’s damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

races.name: Tiefling
races.abilityScoreIncrease: Your Intelligence score increases by 1, and your Charisma score increases by 2.

traits.title: Darkvision
traits.description: Thanks to your infernal heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.title: Hellish Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

traits.title: Infernal Legacy
traits.description: You know the thaumaturgy cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast the hellish rebuke spell once per day as a 2nd-level spell. Once you reach 5th level, you can also cast the darkness spell once per day. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
